section.p: Information about the protocol used by EMS personnel to direct the clinical care of the patient

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11414 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.7"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2022-01-01"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:11639)/@code="67663-5" EMS Protocol Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10713)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title="EMS Protocol Section" (CONF:11021)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry such that it (CONF:11024)
Conforms to Protocol Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.93:2022-01-01)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:11026)
Conforms to Candidate Patient Registry Type (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.94:2022-01-01)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:11639)/@code="67663-5" EMS Protocol Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10713)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title="EMS Protocol Section" (CONF:11021)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry such that it (CONF:11024)
Conforms to Protocol Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.93:2022-01-01)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:11026)
Conforms to Candidate Patient Registry Type (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.94:2022-01-01)

body.codeblock: <section> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.7" extension="2022-01-01"/> <code code="67663-5" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" displayName="EMS Protocol Narrative NEMSIS"/> <title/> <text/> </section>
